title: When you in your promo's.
body:
Then all of a sudden EVERYONE starts speaking some other language.

Or Multiple people go afk at camps.

Or just refuse to communicate.

Its like a switch that goes off in peoples heads. Its like sometimes, not all the time. People just absolutely refuse to Back away there the only ones there. Or refuse to go dragon/Baron because Gotta get dem wolves.
Or even refuse to speak english so you can understand them, so you no if they are saying a Yes or a No. I cant fuckign read your language so if you ping and I get it confused with a Y/N thats not my fault.

That last part has never happened to me yet but im sure it will soon.
--
What does everyone else encounter in there promo's?
I mainly get the refusing to back off people.
